function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adequate ventilation in housing design","Impact":"Increased risk of aerosol transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and air filtration","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, mechanical ventilation systems","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"Architects, builders, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate sound dampening in interior spaces","Impact":"Potential for increased aerosol transmission due to voice loudness","Mitigation":"Incorporating sound-absorbing materials and strategic room layout","Technologies":"Acoustic panels, sound-absorbing ceiling tiles","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"Interior designers, architects, builders"},{"Description":"Shared central air-conditioning without individual filtration zones","Impact":"Risk of spreading airborne contaminants within communal spaces","Mitigation":"Installing separately zoned central air-conditioning with individual filter systems","Technologies":"Ductless mini-split systems, zoning controls","People":"Residents, visitors","Owner":"HVAC professionals, building owners"}]}
